channel.title: CVE Feed for Cesanta Software -- Mongoose-OS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Cesanta Software -- Mongoose-OS

item.title: CVE-2021-27425|2024-08-03T20:48:17.278Z -- cesanta%20software -- mongoose-os
item.description: Cesanta Software Mongoose-OS v2.17.0 is vulnerable to integer wrap-around in function mm_malloc. This improper memory assignment can lead to arbitrary memory allocation, resulting in unexpected behavior such as a crash or a remote code injection/execution.
